amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation to study the methods States use to procure culvert and storm sewer materials and report the findings to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require the Secretary of Transportation to study the methods State's use to procure culvert and storm sewer materials, and report their findings to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gibbs to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gibbs to the Rules amendment (A001).
